name: Aurra Sing, Deadly Assassin
Lore: 'On her assignment to kill Sharad Hett, Aurra used her patience and cunning to help track down the Jedi Master.',
Text: 'Once per game, deploy a device on Aurra from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While armed with a [Ref 3] rifle, it may not be retargeted or stolen, her total weapon destiny is +1, and characters she hits may not be used to satisfy attrition. Immune to attrition < 3 (or < 4 if armed with a rifle).',
